SPOILER.Definition: a description of an important plot development in a television show, movie, or book

SHOUT-OUT.Definition: a message of congratulation, support, or appreciation

MEAT AND POTATOES.Definition: the most important or basic parts of something

CHALLENGE.Definition: an invitation to do something difficult

SUPPLY.Definition: an amount of something that is available for use

DISCOURAGINGLY.Definition: in a way that makes you feel less confident or enthusiastic about doing something

AFFORD.Definition: have enough money to pay for

CURRENCY.Definition: the money that is used in a particular country

TUTORIALS.Definition: a video that basically demonstrates how to make, build, or do something

GET KNOCKED ON THEIR ASS.Definition: get punched so hard that they fall to the ground

FROM TIME TO TIME.Definition: sometimes, but not regularly or very often

UNDERESTIMATE.Definition: to think that something is less important than it actually is

MINDSET.Definition: a person's way of thinking and their opinions

ACCENT.Definition: the way in which people in a particular area or country pronounce words

DIALECTS.Definition: a form of the language that is spoken by a particular group of people

UNITES.Definition: to join together as a group
